verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> working <S%G4903>together<s%> with him we <S%G3870>entreat<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, At an <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> I <S%G1873>hearkened<s%> unto <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%> did I <S%G997>succor<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>; <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%>):

in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> on the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> on the <S%G710>left<s%>,

Now <S%G1161><s%> for a <S%G489>recompense<s%> in like <S%G846>kind<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as <S%G5613>unto<s%> my <S%G5043>children<s%>), <S%G4115>be<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4115>enlarged<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4783>agreement<s%> hath a <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>we<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> a <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3754>said<s%>, I will <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> walk <S%G1704>in<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>; and I will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Come ye <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be ye <S%G873>separate<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> no <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G2532>thing<s%>; And <S%G2504>I<s%> will <S%G1523>receive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>,
